mapper.select: SELECT hl.id, hl.user_id, hl.task_id, hl.task_file, hl.description, hl.final_score, hl.course_id, hl.task_name, hl.view_permission, hl.score_permission, hl.start_time, hl.stop_time, tg.id grade_id, tg.user_id entity_id, tg.comment, tg.score FROM (SELECT hw.id, hw.user_id, hw.task_id, hw.task_file, hw.final_score, ct.course_id, ct.task_name, ct.view_permission, ct.score_permission, ct.start_time, ct.stop_time, ct.description FROM homework hw, (SELECT * FROM course_task WHERE course_id = #{courseId} and view_permission = 1 and score_permission = 1) ct WHERE hw.task_id = ct.id) hl LEFT JOIN task_grade tg ON hl.id = tg.homework_id and tg.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT res.id, res.user_id, res.task_id, res.task_file, res.final_score, res.course_id, res.task_name, res.description, res.view_permission, res.score_permission, res.start_time, res.stop_time, res.title, res.teacher_id, tg.id grade_id, tg.user_id entity_id, tg.comment, tg.score FROM (SELECT hw.id, hw.user_id, hw.task_id, hw.task_file, hw.final_score, hl.course_id, hl.task_name, hl.description, hl.view_permission, hl.score_permission, hl.start_time, hl.stop_time, hl.title, hl.teacher_id FROM homework hw, (SELECT ct.id, ct.course_id, ct.task_name, ct.description, ct.view_permission, ct.score_permission, ct.start_time, ct.stop_time, cs.class_id, cs.title, cs.teacher_id FROM course_task ct, (SELECT * FROM course WHERE course.class_id = #{classId}) cs WHERE ct.course_id = cs.id and ct.view_permission = 1) hl WHERE hw.task_id = hl.id) res LEFT JOIN task_grade tg ON res.id = tg.homework_id and tg.user_id = #{userId}
